mapper.sql: ID, NAME, URL, PID, MLEVEL, ORDER_NO, CREATE_DATE
mapper.select: select * from t_menu a,t_role2menu b where a.id = b.menu_id and b.role_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_menu ( ID, NAME, URL, PID, MLEVEL, ORDER_NO, CREATE_DATE ) values ( seq_nenu.nextval, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mlevel, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orderNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, sysdate )
